title: "gt-themes"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(gt)
library(gtTemplates)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
mtcars |> 
  gt() |> 
  gt_theme_simple()
```


```{r}
metric_cols <- us_migration |> 
  select(matches("^m_")) |> 
  names()

pct_cols <- us_migration |> 
  select(matches("^pct_")) |> 
  names()

print(metric_cols)
print(pct_cols)

us_migration |> 
  gt() |>
  gt_theme_simple() |> 
  fmt_number(
    columns = any_of(metric_cols),
    decimals = 0
  ) |> 
  fmt_percent(
    columns = any_of(pct_cols),
    decimals = 0
  )
```
